subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: In 1992, Andre Agassi finally showed all the doubters, himself included, that he truly did have the right Grand Slam stuff in what was supposed to be the wrong place: Wimbledon’s Centre Court.
snippet: In 1992, Andre Agassi finally showed all the doubters, himself included, that he truly did have the right Grand Slam stuff in what was supposed to be the wrong place: Wimbledon’s Centre Court.
